errors.error_description: The link to the summary of changes points to `CHANGELOG.md`, but the correct file is `NEWS.md`.
correction_candidates: Change the link text from `CHANGELOG.md` to `NEWS.md` and the file path to `NEWS.md`.
Change the link to point to the GitHub releases page.
Remove the sentence linking to the change summary file.
errors.golden_answer: Change the link text from `CHANGELOG.md` to `NEWS.md` and the file path to `NEWS.md`.
